basic.description:
A course which combines study of the history and theory of narrative film and television with the production of narrative videos. Requirements will include a research essay, classroom presentations, and the conceptualization and production of a narrative video.
NOTE    Students may enroll in no more than one production course per academic year: FILM 351/3.0; FILM 352/3.0; FILM 353/3.0; FILM 355/6.0; FILM 365/6.0; FILM 375/6.0; FILM 385/6.0; FILM 410/3.0; FILM 451/3.0; FILM 460/6.0.
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Narrative Theory & Practice

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     A GPA of 2.6 in FILM and (a grade of B- in each of FILM110 and FILM250) and 6.0 units in FILM.
Exclusion     No more than 1 course from FILM353; FILM365
